title: Scrum methodology: The agile mindset
excerpt: Dive into the world of Scrum and discover how this Agile framework empowers teams to work smarter, deliver faster, and adapt to change. Learn the roles, events, and principles that make Scrum a favorite among modern developers and product teams.

title: How to start coding
excerpt: Are you ready to start your journey in programming? In this blog, I will guide you through the first steps, from choosing the ideal language to setting up your development environment and starting to work on real projects. Here, you'll find recommended resources, helpful tips, and tricks to learn programming.
